# Test case for shift right by 16 by Michael McQuade



# no shift
testCase {
1010 1010 1010 1111 0000 0000 0000 0101, 0 0
1010 1010 1010 1111 0000 0000 0000 0101
}

# Logical shift by 16
testCase {
1010 1010 1010 1111 0000 0000 0000 0101, 1 0
0000 0000 0000 0000 1010 1010 1010 1111
}

# Arithmetic case shift by 16
testCase {
1010 1010 1010 1111 0000 0000 0000 0101, 1 1
1111 1111 1111 1111 1010 1010 1010 1111
}

# Arithmetic, leading bit 0
testCase {
0010 1010 1010 1111 0000 0000 0000 0101, 1 1
0000 0000 0000 0000 0010 1010 1010 1111
}
